name: New Empowering Rural America (New ERA) Program
objective: RUS will utilize the New ERA funds to assist eligible entities to achieve the greatest reduction in greenhouse gas emissions while advancing the long-term resiliency, reliability, and affordability of rural electric systems.
assistance_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Three borrowers have been awarded grants and loans, and $2,040,852,232 in funds have been obligated.
